data.name: Keep the Change: Can Bengaluru Sustain the Lessons of the Pandemic
data.summary:
We have all experienced how some things have surprisingly changed for the better, in a short time. We have cleaner air and water; we have thriving nature; we are rediscovering family; and we are recalibrating work. We are also reaching out more deeply into our communities.
This session is about the cityâ€™s hope for a new normal post Covid-19. How do we sustain the good change many citizens experienced? How can we make sure that we also include those for whom the change seemed negative? The sectors covered will span Environment / Ecology, Work, City spaces / planning, Food / Farming, Family and Community.
